Package net.abi.abisEngine.entities

Interface EntityI

All Known Implementing Classes:
Entity, FlatPlane, MonkeyHead
public interface EntityI
Author:
abinash Basic Way Of Communicating With An Game Entity

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Transform getTransform()
    Returns The Transform For The Entity Used To Manipulate The Entity.
    void init()
    Initializes The Entity Before The First Frame Of The Scene That Is Being Rendered.
    void input​(float delta)
    This Function Is Intended For Updating All Input Mechanics For The Entity.
    void render​(Shader shader, RenderingEngine engine)
    This Function Renders The Entity With The Given Shader, And With The Supplied Rendering Engine.
    void setTransform​(Transform trnsfrm)
    Sets The Entity's Transform To The Transform Provided.
    void update​(float delta)
    This Function Is Intended For Updating The Entity (Ex.

  • Method Details

    • init

      void init()
      Initializes The Entity Before The First Frame Of The Scene That Is Being Rendered.

    • input

      void input​(float delta)
      This Function Is Intended For Updating All Input Mechanics For The Entity.
      Parameters:
      delta - The Difference In Time. This Parameter Is Usually Requested Directly From The Core Engine.

    • update

      void update​(float delta)
      This Function Is Intended For Updating The Entity (Ex. Animations And Movements)
      Parameters:
      delta - The Difference In Time. This Parameter Is Usually Requested Directly From The Core Engine.

    • render

      void render​(Shader shader, RenderingEngine engine)
      This Function Renders The Entity With The Given Shader, And With The Supplied Rendering Engine.
      Parameters:
      shader - Shader That Is Used To Render The Entity.
      engine - The Engine Used To Render The Entity.

    • getTransform

      Transform getTransform()
      Returns The Transform For The Entity Used To Manipulate The Entity.
      Returns:
      Transform Object.

    • setTransform

      void setTransform​(Transform trnsfrm)
      Sets The Entity's Transform To The Transform Provided.
      Parameters:
      trnsfrm -
